verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w The|strong="H1732"\w* fool hath said \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart: There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no God, They are corrupt, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* are become abominable \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* ways: there \w is|strong="H1732"\w* none \w that|strong="H1732"\w* doth good, no \w not|strong="H1732"\w* one.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath looked \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* heaven upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* see if \w there|strong="H5331"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* understand \w and|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* gone \w aside|strong="H3824"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w become|strong="H7311"\w* unprofitable \w together|strong="H5921"\w*: \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* none \w that|strong="H5315"\w* doth good, no \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H7311"\w*. \w Their|strong="H5921"\w* \w throat|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w an|strong="H7311"\w* open sepulchre: \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tongues \w they|strong="H5921"\w* acted deceitfully; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poison \w of|strong="H5921"\w* asps \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* lips. \w Their|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* full \w of|strong="H5921"\w* cursing \w and|strong="H3119"\w* bitterness; \w their|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w are|strong="H5315"\w* swift \w to|strong="H5704"\w* shed blood. Destruction \w and|strong="H3119"\w* unhappiness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* ways: \w and|strong="H3119"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* peace \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* known: \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* eyes.

\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* all \w they|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* work iniquity, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* eat bread?

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3201"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord: there \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* trembled \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H6435"\w*, where there \w was|strong="H3201"\w* \w no|strong="H6435"\w* \w fear|strong="H6435"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* just generation: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* confounded \w the|strong="H5921"\w* counsel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poor man, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hope.
Who shall give out of Sion the salvation of Israel? when the Lord shall have turned away the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice and Israel shall be glad.
